creator: sakthi.devendiran@gmail.com
text:
I am using a jsp file which loads some thousands values in a list box ..
The jsp is generated dynamically and the size varies.. When the page is loaded 
it gives the error """65535 size limit reached """"

I dont want to split the jsp ..Is there any work around to solve this problem??
I feel it may be due to tomcat 5.5 ..because the same file is loaded fine in 
weblogic... Is it possible to change tomcat settings to solve this issue??


The error details are as follows
--------------------
Catalina].[localhost].[/star].[jsp]     - Servlet.service() for servlet jsp 
threw exception
org.apache.jasper.JasperException: Unable to compile class for JSP
 -------------------
Generated servlet error:
The code of method _jspService(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) is 
exceeding the 65535 bytes limit
 

 at org.apache.jasper.compiler.DefaultErrorHandler.javacError
(DefaultErrorHandler.java:84)
 at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ErrorDispatcher.javacError
(ErrorDispatcher.java:328)
 at org.apache.jasper.compiler.JDTCompiler.generateClass(JDTCompiler.java:409)
 at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:288)
 at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:267)
 at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:255)
 at org.apache.jasper.JspCompilationContext.compile
(JspCompilationContext.java:563)

(JspServletWrapper.java:293)
 at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.serviceJspFile(JspServlet.java:314)
 at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.service(JspServlet.java:264)
 at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:802)

(ApplicationFilterChain.java:252)

(ApplicationFilterChain.java:173)

(StandardContextValve.java:178)

(StandardHostValve.java:126)

(ErrorReportValve.java:105)
 at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardEngineValve.invoke
(StandardEngineValve.java:107)
 at org.apache.catalina.connector.CoyoteAdapter.service(CoyoteAdapter.java:148)
 at org.apache.coyote.http11.Http11Processor.process(Http11Processor.java:868)

org.apache.coyote.http11.Http11BaseProtocol$Http11ConnectionHandler.processConn
ection(Http11BaseProtocol.java:663)
